desc: Welcome to period peace-of-mind, Moxette. Moxie delivers all your period essentials, self-care and beauty products, sweet treats and other monthly must-haves straight to your door - plus the info and support to go with.

layout.text:
SOFT ON THE PLANET
STRONG ON YOUR PERIOD.

We're changing period care without bleeding the planet
(or compromising period peace-of-mind).
